name: Alpha Sea (itch)
description:
Alpha Sea, an oil rig company that is located in the Persian Gulf. Your goal is to survive and rescue the others who are trapped within the rig. You can do this with your trusty fire-axe which allows you to break through destructible objects. With the use of puzzle solving you can also find other ways to navigate the rig, these include, vent-crawling, making holes in certain walls, finding a keycard to grant access to a higher clearance area.
